name: 3D Mega Coin Drop Party - Haunted Witch Dozer Carnival
name_original: 3D Mega Coin Drop Party - Haunted Witch Dozer Carnival
description:
Haunted Witch Dozer is your next favorite Arcade, Casino and Carnival game packed into one!

Now you and your kids can spend countless hours playing the MEGA ADDICTIVE time waster game for FREE!

Push gold coins and items like gems, souvenirs and other EXCITING prizes by dropping coins into the slots.

Try not to the coins and prizes drop off the side or you won't be able to collect them.

Keep dropping and collecting special items to get bonus effects!

Download NOW and start collecting gold coins and SPECIAL prizes!
